protocol.name: P-GSE30166-1
text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-10
protocol.text: CHP files contain MAS 5.0 probe set summarizations using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The mean target intensity of each array was set to 250.

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-11
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 50% Bleach and 0.1% Tween for 5 minutes and then rinsed 3 times with sterile water. Seeds were stratified at 4˚C for 2 days before being planted on media containing 1X concentration Murashige and Skoog salt mixture (Caisson laboratories), 0.5g/L MES, 1% sucrose, 1% agar and adjusted to pH 5.7 with KOH. At 5 days, seedlings were transferred to standard pH (pH 5.7) or low pH (pH 4.6) media for 24 hours prior to protoplasting and FACS sorting. Low pH media is 1X concentration Murashige and Skoog salt mixture (Caisson laboratories), 3mM DMG, 1% sucrose, 1% agar and adjusted to pH 4.6 with KOH. Standard pH is the same except pH is adjusted to 5.7.

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-12
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown for 5 days (described in Birnbaum et al. 2005) on pH 5.7 media before transfer either to pH 5.7 or pH 4.6 media for 24 hours prior to protoplasting and FACS sorting

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-13
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted with Qiagen Rneasy micro kit according to manufacturer's instructions

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-14
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix two-cycle protocol from total RNA isolated from sorted cells

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-15
protocol.text: hybs with fragmented cRNA were preformed by Expression Analysis (Durham, NC)

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-16
protocol.text: scans were preformed by Expression Analysis (Durham, NC)

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-17
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 50% Bleach and 0.1% Tween for 5 minutes and then rinsed 3 times with sterile water. Seeds were stratified at 4˚C for 2 days before being planted on media containing 1X concentration Murashige and Skoog salt mixture (Caisson laboratories), 0.5g/L MES, 1% sucrose, 1% agar and adjusted to pH 5.7 with KOH. At 5 days, seedlings were transferred to standard pH (pH 5.7) or low pH (pH 4.6) media for 24 hours prior to dissection. Low pH media is 1X concentration Murashige and Skoog salt mixture (Caisson laboratories), 3mM DMG, 1% sucrose, 1% agar and adjusted to pH 4.6 with KOH. Standard pH is the same except pH is adjusted to 5.7.

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-18
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown for 5 days on standard (pH 5.7) media before transfer either to standard or low pH (pH 4.6) media for 24 hours prior to dissection

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-19
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted with Qiagen Rneasy Plant mini kit according to manufacturer's instructions

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-2
text: VALUE = normalized log10 ratio mutant/wild type

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-20
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard two-cycle Affymetrix protocol

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-21
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 50% Bleach and 0.1% Tween for 5 minutes and then rinsed 3 times with sterile water. Seeds were stratified at 4˚C for 2 days before being planted on media containing 1X concentration Murashige and Skoog salt mixture (Caisson laboratories), 0.5g/L MES, 1% sucrose, 1% agar and adjusted to pH 5.7 with KOH. At 5 days, seedlings were transferred to standard pH (pH 5.7) or low pH (pH 4.6) media for the indicated time. Low pH media is 1X concentration Murashige and Skoog salt mixture (Caisson laboratories), 3mM DMG, 1% sucrose, 1% agar and adjusted to pH 4.6 with KOH. Standard pH is the same except pH is adjusted to 5.7.

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-22
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown for 5 days on standard (pH 5.7) media before transfer either to standard or low pH (pH 4.6) media for the indicated time

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-23
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix one-cycle protocol from 1 ug total RNA

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-24
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 50% Bleach and 0.1% Tween for 5 minutes and then rinsed 3 times with sterile water. Seeds were stratified at 4˚C for 2 days before being planted on media standard media. At 5 days, seedlings were transferred to fresh standard (0H) or sulfur deficient media for the indicated time. Sulfur deficient media is composed of 20.6 mM NH4NO3, 18.8 mM KNO3, 1.25 mM KPO4H2, 5 μM KI, 2.99 mM CaCl2, 0.1 mM H3BO3, 1 μM Na2MoO42H2O, 0.1 μM CoCl26H2O, 0.1 mM Na2EDTA2H20, 1.5 mM MgCl2, 0.1 μM CuCl2, 0.1mM FeCl2, 0.1 mM MnCl2, 0.03 mM ZnCl2, 0.05% MES, 1% sucrose, 1% agar.

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-25
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown for 5 days on standard MS media before transfer either to standard (0H) or sulfur deficient media for the indicated time

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-26
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 50% Bleach and 0.1% Tween for 5 minutes and then rinsed 3 times with sterile water. Seeds were stratified at 4˚C for 2 days before being planted on media standard media. At 5 days, seedlings were transferred to sulfur deficient media for 3 hours. Sulfur deficient media is composed of 20.6 mM NH4NO3, 18.8 mM KNO3, 1.25 mM KPO4H2, 5 μM KI, 2.99 mM CaCl2, 0.1 mM H3BO3, 1 μM Na2MoO42H2O, 0.1 μM CoCl26H2O, 0.1 mM Na2EDTA2H20, 1.5 mM MgCl2, 0.1 μM CuCl2, 0.1mM FeCl2, 0.1 mM MnCl2, 0.03 mM ZnCl2, 0.05% MES, 1% sucrose, 1% agar.

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-27
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown for 5 days (described in Birnbaum et al. 2005) on 1X MS media before transfer to sulfur deficient media for 3 hours prior to protoplasting and FACS sorting

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-28
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 50% Bleach and 0.1% Tween for 5 minutes and then rinsed 3 times with sterile water. Seeds were stratified at 4˚C for 2 days before being planted on 1X MS media. After 5 days seedlings were transferred to sulfur deficient media for 3 hours. Sulfur deficient media is composed of 20.6 mM NH4NO3, 18.8 mM KNO3, 1.25 mM KPO4H2, 5 μM KI, 2.99 mM CaCl2, 0.1 mM H3BO3, 1 μM Na2MoO42H2O, 0.1 μM CoCl26H2O, 0.1 mM Na2EDTA2H20, 1.5 mM MgCl2, 0.1 μM CuCl2, 0.1mM FeCl2, 0.1 mM MnCl2, 0.03 mM ZnCl2, 0.05% MES, 1% sucrose, 1% agar.

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-29
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown for 5 days on 1X MS media before transfer to sulfur deficient media 3 hours prior to dissection

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-3
text: VALUE = normalized log10 ratio mutant/wild type

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-30
protocol.text: Whole root tissue was fixed as described in Iyer-Pascuzzi et al. 2011

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-31
protocol.text: scr4/pSCR:SCR:GFP and wild type lines were germinated and grown on 1X MS media for 7 days as described in Iyer-Pascuzzi et al. 2011

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-32
protocol.text: Chromatin Immunoprecipitation as described in Iyer-Pascuzzi et al. 2011

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-33
protocol.text: Chromatin samples were cleaned using a MinElute kit (Qiagen Sciences, Germantown, MD, USA), amplified, and labeled with either Cy3 or Cy5 dye as in Tsukagoshi et al., 2010. 2µg of linearly amplified DNA was used for labeling.

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-34
protocol.text: Hybridization was performed according to the Agilent ChIP-on-chip protocol with 5µg of each labeled sample.

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-35
protocol.text: Images were obtained with scanner G2565BA with protocol CGH-v4_95_Feb07at a resolution of 5 mm.

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-36
protocol.text: Signal extraction and initial data processing were done using the Agilent feature extraction software. Additional data processing as described in Tsukagoshi et al. 2010 and Iyer-Pascuzzi et al. 2011

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-4
protocol.text: Seeds were surface sterilized with 50% Bleach and 0.1% Tween for 5 minutes and then rinsed 3 times with sterile water. Seeds were stratified at 4˚C for 2 days before being planted on media containing 1X concentration Murashige and Skoog salt mixture (Caisson laboratories), 0.5g/L MES, 1% sucrose, 1% agar and adjusted to pH 5.7 with KOH. At 5 days, seedlings were transferred to low pH (pH 4.6) media for 24 hours. Low pH media is 1X concentration Murashige and Skoog salt mixture (Caisson laboratories), 3mM DMG, 1% sucrose, 1% agar and adjusted to pH 4.6 with KOH.

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-5
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown for 5 days on standard (pH 5.7) media before transfer either to standard or low pH (pH 4.6) media fo the indicated time

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-6
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted with Qiagen Rneasy Plant mini and micro kits according to manufacturer's instructions

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-7
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 1 ug total RNA for whole roots and RNA from approximately 50,000 cells for sorted roots

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-8
protocol.text: hybs with fragmented cRNA were preformed by Expression Analysis in Durham, NC

protocol.name: P-GSE30166-9
protocol.text: scans were preformed by Expression Analysis in Durham, NC
